tags.name: api-server-selector
tags.description: A component with a title and an action counter

properties.name: baseUri
properties.description: The baseUri to override any server definition

properties.name: allowCustom
properties.description: When set the `Custom base URI` is rendered in the dropdown

properties.name: servers
properties.description: The current list of servers to render

properties.name: type
properties.description: Currently selected type of the input. Can be `server`, `uri`, or `custom`

properties.name: compatibility
properties.description: Enables compatibility with the anypoint platform

properties.name: autoSelect
properties.description: When set it automaticallt selected the first server from the list of servers when selection is missing.

properties.name: opened
properties.description:
A programmatic access to the opened state of the drop down.
Note, this does nothing when custom element is rendered.
